thread.title: EU says hopes for positive outcome in case of Greek soldiers arrested in Turkey

title: EU says hopes for positive outcome in case of Greek soldiers arrested in Turkey
text: March 6, 2018 / 11:38 AM / in 35 minutes EU says hopes for positive outcome in case of Greek soldiers arrested in Turkey Reuters Staff 1 Min Read BRUSSELS (Reuters) - The European Commission said on Tuesday it hoped for a positive outcome in the case of two Greek soldiers arrested in Turkey last week. “We hope for a swift and positive outcome of this issue, in the spirit of good neighborly relations,” a Commission spokesman told a news conference. A Turkish court remanded in custody on Friday two Greek soldiers who were detained after crossing the border into Turkey in bad weather in a heavily forested frontier region, Turkish media said, despite Greek calls for their swift return. Reporting by Robert-Jan Bartunek
